name: Cherry Chase
description:
Wally worm has taken a liking to Charlie the cherry. Except, Charlie knows better than to trust a hungry worm.

Will Wally get a lil' kiss? Will Charlie give him the slip? Grab a friend and find out!

Controls:

Worm (Player 1): use WASD to move

Cherry (Player 2) Use Arrow Keys to move

This game was made as a practice project for the game engine Godot. I certainly struggled with it more than the previous projects. Any and all feedback is appreciated.

Thank you for your time <3
